02095 }
02096 
02097 static void actcon_new_data (void *cdata)
02098 {
02099     bActionConstraint *data= (bActionConstraint *)cdata;
02100     
02101     /* set type to 20 (Loc X), as 0 is Rot X for backwards compatibility */
02102     data->type = 20;
02103 }
02104 
02105 static void actcon_id_looper (bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
02106 {
02107     bActionConstraint *data= con->data;
02108     
02109     /* target */
02110     func(con, (ID**)&data->tar, userdata);
02111     
02112     /* action */
02113     func(con, (ID**)&data->act, userdata);
02114 }
02115 
02116 static int actcon_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
02117 {
02118     if (con && list) {
02119         bActionConstraint *data= con->data;
02120         bConstraintTarget *ct;
02121         
02122         /* standard target-getting macro for single-target constraints */
02123         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
02124         
02125         return 1;
02126     }
02127     
02128     return 0;
02129 }
02130 
02131 static void actcon_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
02132 {
02133     if (con && list) {
02134         bActionConstraint *data= con->data;
02135         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
02136         
02137         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02138         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
02139     }
02140 }
02141 
02142 static void actcon_get_tarmat (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, bConstraintTarget *ct, float UNUSED(ctime))
02143 {
02144     bActionConstraint *data = con->data;
02145     
02146     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02147         float tempmat[4][4], vec[3];
02148         float s, t;
02149         short axis;
02150         
02151         /* initialize return matrix */
02152         unit_m4(ct->matrix);
02153         
02154         /* get the transform matrix of the target */
02155         constraint_target_to_mat4(ct->tar, ct->subtarget, tempmat, CONSTRAINT_SPACE_WORLD, ct->space, con->headtail);
02156         
02157         /* determine where in transform range target is */
02158         /* data->type is mapped as follows for backwards compatibility:
02159          *  00,01,02    - rotation (it used to be like this)
02160          *  10,11,12    - scaling
02161          *  20,21,22    - location
02162          */
02163         if (data->type < 10) {
02164             /* extract rotation (is in whatever space target should be in) */
02165             mat4_to_eul(vec, tempmat);
02166             mul_v3_fl(vec, RAD2DEGF(1.0f)); /* rad -> deg */
02167             axis= data->type;
02168         }
02169         else if (data->type < 20) {
02170             /* extract scaling (is in whatever space target should be in) */
02171             mat4_to_size(vec, tempmat);
02172             axis= data->type - 10;
02173         }
02174         else {
02175             /* extract location */
02176             copy_v3_v3(vec, tempmat[3]);
02177             axis= data->type - 20;
02178         }
02179         
02180         /* Target defines the animation */
02181         s = (vec[axis]-data->min) / (data->max-data->min);
02182         CLAMP(s, 0, 1);
02183         t = (s * (data->end-data->start)) + data->start;
02184         
02185         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
02186             printf("do Action Constraint %s - Ob %s Pchan %s\n", con->name, cob->ob->id.name+2, (cob->pchan)?cob->pchan->name:NULL);
02187         
02188         /* Get the appropriate information from the action */
02189         if (cob->type == CONSTRAINT_OBTYPE_BONE) {
02190             Object workob;
02191             bPose *pose;
02192             bPoseChannel *pchan, *tchan;
02193             
02194             /* make a temporary pose and evaluate using that */
02195             pose = MEM_callocN(sizeof(bPose), "pose");
02196             
02197             /* make a copy of the bone of interest in the temp pose before evaluating action, so that it can get set 
02198              *  - we need to manually copy over a few settings, including rotation order, otherwise this fails
02199              */
02200             pchan = cob->pchan;
02201             
02202             tchan= verify_pose_channel(pose, pchan->name);
02203             tchan->rotmode= pchan->rotmode;
02204             
02205             /* evaluate action using workob (it will only set the PoseChannel in question) */
02206             what_does_obaction(cob->ob, &workob, pose, data->act, pchan->name, t);
02207             
02208             /* convert animation to matrices for use here */
02209             pchan_calc_mat(tchan);
02210             copy_m4_m4(ct->matrix, tchan->chan_mat);
02211             
02212             /* Clean up */
02213             free_pose(pose);
02214         }
02215         else if (cob->type == CONSTRAINT_OBTYPE_OBJECT) {
02216             Object workob;
02217             
02218             /* evaluate using workob */
02219             // FIXME: we don't have any consistent standards on limiting effects on object...
02220             what_does_obaction(cob->ob, &workob, NULL, data->act, NULL, t);
02221             object_to_mat4(&workob, ct->matrix);
02222         }
02223         else {
02224             /* behavior undefined... */
02225             puts("Error: unknown owner type for Action Constraint");
02226         }
02227     }
02228 }
02229 
02230 static void actcon_evaluate (bConstraint *UNUSED(con), bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
02231 {
02232     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
02233     
02234     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02235         float temp[4][4];
02236         
02237         /* Nice and simple... we just need to multiply the matrices, as the get_target_matrix
02238          * function has already taken care of everything else.
02239          */
02240         copy_m4_m4(temp, cob->matrix);
02241         mult_m4_m4m4(cob->matrix, temp, ct->matrix);
02242     }
02243 }
02244 
02245 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_ACTION = {
02246     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_ACTION, /* type */
02247     sizeof(bActionConstraint), /* size */
02248     "Action", /* name */
02249     "bActionConstraint", /* struct name */
02250     NULL, /* free data */
02251     actcon_relink, /* relink data */
02252     actcon_id_looper, /* id looper */
02253     NULL, /* copy data */
02254     actcon_new_data, /* new data */
02255     actcon_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
02256     actcon_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
02257     actcon_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
02258     actcon_evaluate /* evaluate */
02259 };
02260 
02261 /* --------- Locked Track ---------- */
02262 
02263 static void locktrack_new_data (void *cdata)
02264 {
02265     bLockTrackConstraint *data= (bLockTrackConstraint *)cdata;
02266     
02267     data->trackflag = TRACK_Y;
02268     data->lockflag = LOCK_Z;
02269 }   
02270 
02271 static void locktrack_id_looper (bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
02272 {
02273     bLockTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
02274     
02275     /* target only */
02276     func(con, (ID**)&data->tar, userdata);
02277 }
02278 
02279 static int locktrack_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
02280 {
02281     if (con && list) {
02282         bLockTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
02283         bConstraintTarget *ct;
02284         
02285         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02286         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
02287         
02288         return 1;
02289     }
02290     
02291     return 0;
02292 }
02293 
02294 static void locktrack_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
02295 {
02296     if (con && list) {
02297         bLockTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
02298         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
02299         
02300         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02301         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
02302     }
02303 }
02304 
02305 static void locktrack_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
02306 {
02307     bLockTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
02308     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
02309     
02310     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02311         float vec[3],vec2[3];
02312         float totmat[3][3];
02313         float tmpmat[3][3];
02314         float invmat[3][3];
02315         float tmat[4][4];
02316         float mdet;
02317         
02318         /* Vector object -> target */
02319         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, ct->matrix[3], cob->matrix[3]);
02320         switch (data->lockflag) {
02321         case LOCK_X: /* LOCK X */
02322         {
02323             switch (data->trackflag) {
02324                 case TRACK_Y: /* LOCK X TRACK Y */
02325                 {
02326                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02327                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[0]);
02328                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], vec, vec2);
02329                     normalize_v3(totmat[1]);
02330                     
02331                     /* the x axis is fixed */
02332                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[0], cob->matrix[0]);
02333                     
02334                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02335                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], totmat[0], totmat[1]);
02336                 }
02337                     break;
02338                 case TRACK_Z: /* LOCK X TRACK Z */
02339                 {
02340                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02341                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[0]);
02342                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], vec, vec2);
02343                     normalize_v3(totmat[2]);
02344                     
02345                     /* the x axis is fixed */
02346                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[0], cob->matrix[0]);
02347                     
02348                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02349                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], totmat[2], totmat[0]);
02350                 }
02351                     break;
02352                 case TRACK_nY: /* LOCK X TRACK -Y */
02353                 {
02354                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02355                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[0]);
02356                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], vec, vec2);
02357                     normalize_v3(totmat[1]);
02358                     negate_v3(totmat[1]);
02359                     
02360                     /* the x axis is fixed */
02361                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[0], cob->matrix[0]);
02362                     
02363                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02364                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], totmat[0], totmat[1]);
02365                 }
02366                     break;
02367                 case TRACK_nZ: /* LOCK X TRACK -Z */
02368                 {
02369                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02370                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[0]);
02371                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], vec, vec2);
02372                     normalize_v3(totmat[2]);
02373                     negate_v3(totmat[2]);
02374                         
02375                     /* the x axis is fixed */
02376                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[0], cob->matrix[0]);
02377                         
02378                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02379                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], totmat[2], totmat[0]);
02380                 }
02381                     break;
02382                 default:
02383                 {
02384                     unit_m3(totmat);
02385                 }
02386                     break;
02387             }
02388         }
02389             break;
02390         case LOCK_Y: /* LOCK Y */
02391         {
02392             switch (data->trackflag) {
02393                 case TRACK_X: /* LOCK Y TRACK X */
02394                 {
02395                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02396                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[1]);
02397                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], vec, vec2);
02398                     normalize_v3(totmat[0]);
02399                     
02400                     /* the y axis is fixed */
02401                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[1], cob->matrix[1]);
02402 
02403                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02404                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], totmat[0], totmat[1]);
02405                 }
02406                     break;
02407                 case TRACK_Z: /* LOCK Y TRACK Z */
02408                 {
02409                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02410                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[1]);
02411                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], vec, vec2);
02412                     normalize_v3(totmat[2]);
02413                     
02414                     /* the y axis is fixed */
02415                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[1], cob->matrix[1]);
02416                     
02417                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02418                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], totmat[1], totmat[2]);
02419                 }
02420                     break;
02421                 case TRACK_nX: /* LOCK Y TRACK -X */
02422                 {
02423                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02424                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[1]);
02425                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], vec, vec2);
02426                     normalize_v3(totmat[0]);
02427                     negate_v3(totmat[0]);
02428                     
02429                     /* the y axis is fixed */
02430                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[1], cob->matrix[1]);
02431                     
02432                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02433                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], totmat[0], totmat[1]);
02434                 }
02435                     break;
02436                 case TRACK_nZ: /* LOCK Y TRACK -Z */
02437                 {
02438                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02439                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[1]);
02440                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[2], vec, vec2);
02441                     normalize_v3(totmat[2]);
02442                     negate_v3(totmat[2]);
02443                     
02444                     /* the y axis is fixed */
02445                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[1], cob->matrix[1]);
02446                     
02447                     /* the z axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02448                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], totmat[1], totmat[2]);
02449                 }
02450                     break;
02451                 default:
02452                 {
02453                     unit_m3(totmat);
02454                 }
02455                     break;
02456             }
02457         }
02458             break;
02459         case LOCK_Z: /* LOCK Z */
02460         {
02461             switch (data->trackflag) {
02462                 case TRACK_X: /* LOCK Z TRACK X */
02463                 {
02464                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02465                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[2]);
02466                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], vec, vec2);
02467                     normalize_v3(totmat[0]);
02468                     
02469                     /* the z axis is fixed */
02470                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[2], cob->matrix[2]);
02471                     
02472                     /* the x axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02473                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], totmat[2], totmat[0]);
02474                 }
02475                     break;
02476                 case TRACK_Y: /* LOCK Z TRACK Y */
02477                 {
02478                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02479                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[2]);
02480                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], vec, vec2);
02481                     normalize_v3(totmat[1]);
02482                     
02483                     /* the z axis is fixed */
02484                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[2], cob->matrix[2]);
02485                         
02486                     /* the x axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02487                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], totmat[1], totmat[2]);
02488                 }
02489                     break;
02490                 case TRACK_nX: /* LOCK Z TRACK -X */
02491                 {
02492                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02493                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[2]);
02494                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], vec, vec2);
02495                     normalize_v3(totmat[0]);
02496                     negate_v3(totmat[0]);
02497                     
02498                     /* the z axis is fixed */
02499                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[2], cob->matrix[2]);
02500                     
02501                     /* the x axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02502                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], totmat[2], totmat[0]);
02503                 }
02504                     break;
02505                 case TRACK_nY: /* LOCK Z TRACK -Y */
02506                 {
02507                     /* Projection of Vector on the plane */
02508                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec, cob->matrix[2]);
02509                     sub_v3_v3v3(totmat[1], vec, vec2);
02510                     normalize_v3(totmat[1]);
02511                     negate_v3(totmat[1]);
02512                     
02513                     /* the z axis is fixed */
02514                     normalize_v3_v3(totmat[2], cob->matrix[2]);
02515                         
02516                     /* the x axis gets mapped onto a third orthogonal vector */
02517                     cross_v3_v3v3(totmat[0], totmat[1], totmat[2]);
02518                 }
02519                     break;
02520                 default:
02521                 {
02522                     unit_m3(totmat);
02523                 }
02524                     break;
02525             }
02526         }
02527             break;
02528         default:
02529         {
02530             unit_m3(totmat);
02531         }
02532             break;
02533         }
02534         /* Block to keep matrix heading */
02535         copy_m3_m4(tmpmat, cob->matrix);
02536         normalize_m3(tmpmat);
02537         invert_m3_m3(invmat, tmpmat);
02538         mul_m3_m3m3(tmpmat, totmat, invmat);
02539         totmat[0][0] = tmpmat[0][0];totmat[0][1] = tmpmat[0][1];totmat[0][2] = tmpmat[0][2];
02540         totmat[1][0] = tmpmat[1][0];totmat[1][1] = tmpmat[1][1];totmat[1][2] = tmpmat[1][2];
02541         totmat[2][0] = tmpmat[2][0];totmat[2][1] = tmpmat[2][1];totmat[2][2] = tmpmat[2][2];
02542         
02543         copy_m4_m4(tmat, cob->matrix);
02544         
02545         mdet = determinant_m3(  totmat[0][0],totmat[0][1],totmat[0][2],
02546                         totmat[1][0],totmat[1][1],totmat[1][2],
02547                         totmat[2][0],totmat[2][1],totmat[2][2]);
02548         if (mdet==0) {
02549             unit_m3(totmat);
02550         }
02551         
02552         /* apply out transformaton to the object */
02553         mul_m4_m3m4(cob->matrix, totmat, tmat);
02554     }
02555 }
02556 
02557 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_LOCKTRACK = {
02558     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_LOCKTRACK, /* type */
02559     sizeof(bLockTrackConstraint), /* size */
02560     "Locked Track", /* name */
02561     "bLockTrackConstraint", /* struct name */
02562     NULL, /* free data */
02563     NULL, /* relink data */
02564     locktrack_id_looper, /* id looper */
02565     NULL, /* copy data */
02566     locktrack_new_data, /* new data */
02567     locktrack_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
02568     locktrack_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
02569     default_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
02570     locktrack_evaluate /* evaluate */
02571 };

02573 /* ---------- Limit Distance Constraint ----------- */
02574 
02575 static void distlimit_new_data (void *cdata)
02576 {
02577     bDistLimitConstraint *data= (bDistLimitConstraint *)cdata;
02578     
02579     data->dist= 0.0f;
02580 }
02581 
02582 static void distlimit_id_looper (bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
02583 {
02584     bDistLimitConstraint *data= con->data;
02585     
02586     /* target only */
02587     func(con, (ID**)&data->tar, userdata);
02588 }
02589 
02590 static int distlimit_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
02591 {
02592     if (con && list) {
02593         bDistLimitConstraint *data= con->data;
02594         bConstraintTarget *ct;
02595         
02596         /* standard target-getting macro for single-target constraints */
02597         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
02598         
02599         return 1;
02600     }
02601     
02602     return 0;
02603 }
02604 
02605 static void distlimit_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
02606 {
02607     if (con && list) {
02608         bDistLimitConstraint *data= con->data;
02609         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
02610         
02611         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02612         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
02613     }
02614 }
02615 
02616 static void distlimit_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
02617 {
02618     bDistLimitConstraint *data= con->data;
02619     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
02620     
02621     /* only evaluate if there is a target */
02622     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02623         float dvec[3], dist=0.0f, sfac=1.0f;
02624         short clamp_surf= 0;
02625         
02626         /* calculate our current distance from the target */
02627         dist= len_v3v3(cob->matrix[3], ct->matrix[3]);
02628         
02629         /* set distance (flag is only set when user demands it) */
02630         if (data->dist == 0)
02631             data->dist= dist;
02632         
02633         /* check if we're which way to clamp from, and calculate interpolation factor (if needed) */
02634         if (data->mode == LIMITDIST_OUTSIDE) {
02635             /* if inside, then move to surface */
02636             if (dist <= data->dist) {
02637                 clamp_surf= 1;
02638                 if (dist != 0.0f) sfac= data->dist / dist;
02639             }
02640             /* if soft-distance is enabled, start fading once owner is dist+softdist from the target */
02641             else if (data->flag & LIMITDIST_USESOFT) {
02642                 if (dist <= (data->dist + data->soft)) {
02643                     
02644                 }
02645             }
02646         }
02647         else if (data->mode == LIMITDIST_INSIDE) {
02648             /* if outside, then move to surface */
02649             if (dist >= data->dist) {
02650                 clamp_surf= 1;
02651                 if (dist != 0.0f) sfac= data->dist / dist;
02652             }
02653             /* if soft-distance is enabled, start fading once owner is dist-soft from the target */
02654             else if (data->flag & LIMITDIST_USESOFT) {
02655                 // FIXME: there's a problem with "jumping" when this kicks in
02656                 if (dist >= (data->dist - data->soft)) {
02657                     sfac = (float)( data->soft*(1.0f - expf(-(dist - data->dist)/data->soft)) + data->dist );
02658                     if (dist != 0.0f) sfac /= dist;
02659                     
02660                     clamp_surf= 1;
02661                 }
02662             }
02663         }
02664         else {
02665             if (IS_EQF(dist, data->dist)==0) {
02666                 clamp_surf= 1;
02667                 if (dist != 0.0f) sfac= data->dist / dist;
02668             }
02669         }
02670         
02671         /* clamp to 'surface' (i.e. move owner so that dist == data->dist) */
02672         if (clamp_surf) {
02673             /* simply interpolate along line formed by target -> owner */
02674             interp_v3_v3v3(dvec, ct->matrix[3], cob->matrix[3], sfac);
02675             
02676             /* copy new vector onto owner */
02677             copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], dvec);
02678         }
02679     }
02680 }
02681 
02682 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_DISTLIMIT = {
02683     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_DISTLIMIT, /* type */
02684     sizeof(bDistLimitConstraint), /* size */
02685     "Limit Distance", /* name */
02686     "bDistLimitConstraint", /* struct name */
02687     NULL, /* free data */
02688     NULL, /* relink data */
02689     distlimit_id_looper, /* id looper */
02690     NULL, /* copy data */
02691     distlimit_new_data, /* new data */
02692     distlimit_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
02693     distlimit_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
02694     default_get_tarmat, /* get a target matrix */
02695     distlimit_evaluate /* evaluate */
02696 };
02697 
02698 /* ---------- Stretch To ------------ */
02699 
02700 static void stretchto_new_data (void *cdata)
02701 {
02702     bStretchToConstraint *data= (bStretchToConstraint *)cdata;
02703     
02704     data->volmode = 0;
02705     data->plane = 0;
02706     data->orglength = 0.0; 
02707     data->bulge = 1.0;
02708 }
02709 
02710 static void stretchto_id_looper (bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
02711 {
02712     bStretchToConstraint *data= con->data;
02713     
02714     /* target only */
02715     func(con, (ID**)&data->tar, userdata);
02716 }
02717 
02718 static int stretchto_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
02719 {
02720     if (con && list) {
02721         bStretchToConstraint *data= con->data;
02722         bConstraintTarget *ct;
02723         
02724         /* standard target-getting macro for single-target constraints */
02725         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
02726         
02727         return 1;
02728     }
02729     
02730     return 0;
02731 }
02732 
02733 static void stretchto_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
02734 {
02735     if (con && list) {
02736         bStretchToConstraint *data= con->data;
02737         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
02738         
02739         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02740         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
02741     }
02742 }
02743 
02744 static void stretchto_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
02745 {
02746     bStretchToConstraint *data= con->data;
02747     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
02748     
02749     /* only evaluate if there is a target */
02750     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02751         float size[3], scale[3], vec[3], xx[3], zz[3], orth[3];
02752         float totmat[3][3];
02753         float tmat[4][4];
02754         float dist;
02755         
02756         /* store scaling before destroying obmat */
02757         mat4_to_size(size, cob->matrix);
02758         
02759         /* store X orientation before destroying obmat */
02760         normalize_v3_v3(xx, cob->matrix[0]);
02761         
02762         /* store Z orientation before destroying obmat */
02763         normalize_v3_v3(zz, cob->matrix[2]);
02764         
02765         /* XXX That makes the constraint buggy with asymmetrically scaled objects, see #29940. */
02766 /*      sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cob->matrix[3], ct->matrix[3]);*/
02767 /*      vec[0] /= size[0];*/
02768 /*      vec[1] /= size[1];*/
02769 /*      vec[2] /= size[2];*/
02770         
02771 /*      dist = normalize_v3(vec);*/
02772         
02773         dist = len_v3v3(cob->matrix[3], ct->matrix[3]);
02774         /* Only Y constrained object axis scale should be used, to keep same length when scaling it. */
02775         dist /= size[1];
02776         
02777         /* data->orglength==0 occurs on first run, and after 'R' button is clicked */
02778         if (data->orglength == 0)
02779             data->orglength = dist;
02780         if (data->bulge == 0)
02781             data->bulge = 1.0;
02782         
02783         scale[1] = dist/data->orglength;
02784         switch (data->volmode) {
02785         /* volume preserving scaling */
02786         case VOLUME_XZ :
02787             scale[0] = 1.0f - (float)sqrt(data->bulge) + (float)sqrt(data->bulge*(data->orglength/dist));
02788             scale[2] = scale[0];
02789             break;
02790         case VOLUME_X:
02791             scale[0] = 1.0f + data->bulge * (data->orglength /dist - 1);
02792             scale[2] = 1.0;
02793             break;
02794         case VOLUME_Z:
02795             scale[0] = 1.0;
02796             scale[2] = 1.0f + data->bulge * (data->orglength /dist - 1);
02797             break;
02798             /* don't care for volume */
02799         case NO_VOLUME:
02800             scale[0] = 1.0;
02801             scale[2] = 1.0;
02802             break;
02803         default: /* should not happen, but in case*/
02804             return;    
02805         } /* switch (data->volmode) */
02806 
02807         /* Clear the object's rotation and scale */
02808         cob->matrix[0][0]=size[0]*scale[0];
02809         cob->matrix[0][1]=0;
02810         cob->matrix[0][2]=0;
02811         cob->matrix[1][0]=0;
02812         cob->matrix[1][1]=size[1]*scale[1];
02813         cob->matrix[1][2]=0;
02814         cob->matrix[2][0]=0;
02815         cob->matrix[2][1]=0;
02816         cob->matrix[2][2]=size[2]*scale[2];
02817         
02818         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cob->matrix[3], ct->matrix[3]);
02819         normalize_v3(vec);
02820         
02821         /* new Y aligns  object target connection*/
02822         negate_v3_v3(totmat[1], vec);
02823         switch (data->plane) {
02824         case PLANE_X:
02825             /* build new Z vector */
02826             /* othogonal to "new Y" "old X! plane */
02827             cross_v3_v3v3(orth, vec, xx);
02828             normalize_v3(orth);
02829             
02830             /* new Z*/
02831             copy_v3_v3(totmat[2], orth);
02832             
02833             /* we decided to keep X plane*/
02834             cross_v3_v3v3(xx, orth, vec);
02835             normalize_v3_v3(totmat[0], xx);
02836             break;
02837         case PLANE_Z:
02838             /* build new X vector */
02839             /* othogonal to "new Y" "old Z! plane */
02840             cross_v3_v3v3(orth, vec, zz);
02841             normalize_v3(orth);
02842             
02843             /* new X */
02844             negate_v3_v3(totmat[0], orth);
02845             
02846             /* we decided to keep Z */
02847             cross_v3_v3v3(zz, orth, vec);
02848             normalize_v3_v3(totmat[2], zz);
02849             break;
02850         } /* switch (data->plane) */
02851         
02852         copy_m4_m4(tmat, cob->matrix);
02853         mul_m4_m3m4(cob->matrix, totmat, tmat);
02854     }
02855 }
02856 
02857 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_STRETCHTO = {
02858     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_STRETCHTO, /* type */
02859     sizeof(bStretchToConstraint), /* size */
02860     "Stretch To", /* name */
02861     "bStretchToConstraint", /* struct name */
02862     NULL, /* free data */
02863     NULL, /* relink data */
02864     stretchto_id_looper, /* id looper */
02865     NULL, /* copy data */
02866     stretchto_new_data, /* new data */
02867     stretchto_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
02868     stretchto_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
02869     default_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
02870     stretchto_evaluate /* evaluate */
02871 };
02872 
02873 /* ---------- Floor ------------ */
02874 
02875 static void minmax_new_data (void *cdata)
02876 {
02877     bMinMaxConstraint *data= (bMinMaxConstraint *)cdata;
02878     
02879     data->minmaxflag = TRACK_Z;
02880     data->offset = 0.0f;
02881     zero_v3(data->cache);
02882     data->flag = 0;
02883 }
02884 
02885 static void minmax_id_looper (bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
02886 {
02887     bMinMaxConstraint *data= con->data;
02888     
02889     /* target only */
02890     func(con, (ID**)&data->tar, userdata);
02891 }
02892 
02893 static int minmax_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
02894 {
02895     if (con && list) {
02896         bMinMaxConstraint *data= con->data;
02897         bConstraintTarget *ct;
02898         
02899         /* standard target-getting macro for single-target constraints */
02900         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
02901         
02902         return 1;
02903     }
02904     
02905     return 0;
02906 }
02907 
02908 static void minmax_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
02909 {
02910     if (con && list) {
02911         bMinMaxConstraint *data= con->data;
02912         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
02913         
02914         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
02915         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
02916     }
02917 }
02918 
02919 static void minmax_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
02920 {
02921     bMinMaxConstraint *data= con->data;
02922     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
02923     
02924     /* only evaluate if there is a target */
02925     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
02926         float obmat[4][4], imat[4][4], tarmat[4][4], tmat[4][4];
02927         float val1, val2;
02928         int index;
02929         
02930         copy_m4_m4(obmat, cob->matrix);
02931         copy_m4_m4(tarmat, ct->matrix);
02932         
02933         if (data->flag & MINMAX_USEROT) {
02934             /* take rotation of target into account by doing the transaction in target's localspace */
02935             invert_m4_m4(imat, tarmat);
02936             mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, imat, obmat);
02937             copy_m4_m4(obmat, tmat);
02938             unit_m4(tarmat);
02939         }
02940         
02941         switch (data->minmaxflag) {
02942         case TRACK_Z:
02943             val1 = tarmat[3][2];
02944             val2 = obmat[3][2]-data->offset;
02945             index = 2;
02946             break;
02947         case TRACK_Y:
02948             val1 = tarmat[3][1];
02949             val2 = obmat[3][1]-data->offset;
02950             index = 1;
02951             break;
02952         case TRACK_X:
02953             val1 = tarmat[3][0];
02954             val2 = obmat[3][0]-data->offset;
02955             index = 0;
02956             break;
02957         case TRACK_nZ:
02958             val2 = tarmat[3][2];
02959             val1 = obmat[3][2]-data->offset;
02960             index = 2;
02961             break;
02962         case TRACK_nY:
02963             val2 = tarmat[3][1];
02964             val1 = obmat[3][1]-data->offset;
02965             index = 1;
02966             break;
02967         case TRACK_nX:
02968             val2 = tarmat[3][0];
02969             val1 = obmat[3][0]-data->offset;
02970             index = 0;
02971             break;
02972         default:
02973             return;
02974         }
02975         
02976         if (val1 > val2) {
02977             obmat[3][index] = tarmat[3][index] + data->offset;
02978             if (data->flag & MINMAX_STICKY) {
02979                 if (data->flag & MINMAX_STUCK) {
02980                     copy_v3_v3(obmat[3], data->cache);
02981                 } 
02982                 else {
02983                     copy_v3_v3(data->cache, obmat[3]);
02984                     data->flag |= MINMAX_STUCK;
02985                 }
02986             }
02987             if (data->flag & MINMAX_USEROT) {
02988                 /* get out of localspace */
02989                 mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, ct->matrix, obmat);
02990                 copy_m4_m4(cob->matrix, tmat);
02991             } 
02992             else {          
02993                 copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], obmat[3]);
02994             }
02995         } 
02996         else {
02997             data->flag &= ~MINMAX_STUCK;
02998         }
02999     }
03000 }
03001 
03002 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_MINMAX = {
03003     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_MINMAX, /* type */
03004     sizeof(bMinMaxConstraint), /* size */
03005     "Floor", /* name */
03006     "bMinMaxConstraint", /* struct name */
03007     NULL, /* free data */
03008     NULL, /* relink data */
03009     minmax_id_looper, /* id looper */
03010     NULL, /* copy data */
03011     minmax_new_data, /* new data */
03012     minmax_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03013     minmax_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
03014     default_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
03015     minmax_evaluate /* evaluate */
03016 };

03114 
03115 static void clampto_get_tarmat (bConstraint *UNUSED(con), bConstraintOb *cob, bConstraintTarget *ct, float UNUSED(ctime))
03116 {
03117     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
03118         Curve *cu= ct->tar->data;
03119         
03120         /* note: when creating constraints that follow path, the curve gets the CU_PATH set now,
03121          *      currently for paths to work it needs to go through the bevlist/displist system (ton) 
03122          */
03123         
03124         /* only happens on reload file, but violates depsgraph still... fix! */
03125         if (cu->path==NULL || cu->path->data==NULL)
03126             makeDispListCurveTypes(cob->scene, ct->tar, 0);
03127     }
03128     
03129     /* technically, this isn't really needed for evaluation, but we don't know what else
03130      * might end up calling this...
03131      */
03132     if (ct)
03133         unit_m4(ct->matrix);
03134 }
03135 
03136 static void clampto_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
03137 {
03138     bClampToConstraint *data= con->data;
03139     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
03140     
03141     /* only evaluate if there is a target and it is a curve */
03142     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct) && (ct->tar->type == OB_CURVE)) {
03143         Curve *cu= data->tar->data;
03144         float obmat[4][4], ownLoc[3];
03145         float curveMin[3], curveMax[3];
03146         float targetMatrix[4][4]= MAT4_UNITY;
03147         
03148         copy_m4_m4(obmat, cob->matrix);
03149         copy_v3_v3(ownLoc, obmat[3]);
03150         
03151         INIT_MINMAX(curveMin, curveMax)
03152         minmax_object(ct->tar, curveMin, curveMax);
03153         
03154         /* get targetmatrix */
03155         if (cu->path && cu->path->data) {
03156             float vec[4], dir[3], totmat[4][4];
03157             float curvetime;
03158             short clamp_axis;
03159             
03160             /* find best position on curve */
03161             /* 1. determine which axis to sample on? */
03162             if (data->flag == CLAMPTO_AUTO) {
03163                 float size[3];
03164                 sub_v3_v3v3(size, curveMax, curveMin);
03165                 
03166                 /* find axis along which the bounding box has the greatest
03167                  * extent. Otherwise, default to the x-axis, as that is quite
03168                  * frequently used.
03169                  */
03170                 if ((size[2]>size[0]) && (size[2]>size[1]))
03171                     clamp_axis= CLAMPTO_Z - 1;
03172                 else if ((size[1]>size[0]) && (size[1]>size[2]))
03173                     clamp_axis= CLAMPTO_Y - 1;
03174                 else
03175                     clamp_axis = CLAMPTO_X - 1;
03176             }
03177             else 
03178                 clamp_axis= data->flag - 1;
03179                 
03180             /* 2. determine position relative to curve on a 0-1 scale based on bounding box */
03181             if (data->flag2 & CLAMPTO_CYCLIC) {
03182                 /* cyclic, so offset within relative bounding box is used */
03183                 float len= (curveMax[clamp_axis] - curveMin[clamp_axis]);
03184                 float offset;
03185                 
03186                 /* check to make sure len is not so close to zero that it'll cause errors */
03187                 if (IS_EQ(len, 0) == 0) {
03188                     /* find bounding-box range where target is located */
03189                     if (ownLoc[clamp_axis] < curveMin[clamp_axis]) {
03190                         /* bounding-box range is before */
03191                         offset = curveMin[clamp_axis] - ceil((curveMin[clamp_axis] - ownLoc[clamp_axis]) / len) * len;
03192 
03193                         /* now, we calculate as per normal, except using offset instead of curveMin[clamp_axis] */
03194                         curvetime = (ownLoc[clamp_axis] - offset) / (len);
03195                     }
03196                     else if (ownLoc[clamp_axis] > curveMax[clamp_axis]) {
03197                         /* bounding-box range is after */
03198                         offset= curveMax[clamp_axis] + (int)((ownLoc[clamp_axis] - curveMax[clamp_axis]) / len) * len;
03199 
03200                         /* now, we calculate as per normal, except using offset instead of curveMax[clamp_axis] */
03201                         curvetime = (ownLoc[clamp_axis] - offset) / (len);
03202                     }
03203                     else {
03204                         /* as the location falls within bounds, just calculate */
03205                         curvetime = (ownLoc[clamp_axis] - curveMin[clamp_axis]) / (len);
03206                     }
03207                 }
03208                 else {
03209                     /* as length is close to zero, curvetime by default should be 0 (i.e. the start) */
03210                     curvetime= 0.0f;
03211                 }
03212             }
03213             else {
03214                 /* no cyclic, so position is clamped to within the bounding box */
03215                 if (ownLoc[clamp_axis] <= curveMin[clamp_axis])
03216                     curvetime = 0.0f;
03217                 else if (ownLoc[clamp_axis] >= curveMax[clamp_axis])
03218                     curvetime = 1.0f;
03219                 else if ( IS_EQ((curveMax[clamp_axis] - curveMin[clamp_axis]), 0) == 0 )
03220                     curvetime = (ownLoc[clamp_axis] - curveMin[clamp_axis]) / (curveMax[clamp_axis] - curveMin[clamp_axis]);
03221                 else 
03222                     curvetime = 0.0f;
03223             }
03224             
03225             /* 3. position on curve */
03226             if (where_on_path(ct->tar, curvetime, vec, dir, NULL, NULL, NULL) ) {
03227                 unit_m4(totmat);
03228                 copy_v3_v3(totmat[3], vec);
03229                 
03230                 mul_serie_m4(targetMatrix, ct->tar->obmat, totmat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
03231             }
03232         }
03233         
03234         /* obtain final object position */
03235         copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], targetMatrix[3]);
03236     }
03237 }
03238 
03239 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_CLAMPTO = {
03240     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_CLAMPTO, /* type */
03241     sizeof(bClampToConstraint), /* size */
03242     "Clamp To", /* name */
03243     "bClampToConstraint", /* struct name */
03244     NULL, /* free data */
03245     NULL, /* relink data */
03246     clampto_id_looper, /* id looper */
03247     NULL, /* copy data */
03248     NULL, /* new data */
03249     clampto_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03250     clampto_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
03251     clampto_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
03252     clampto_evaluate /* evaluate */
03253 };

03299 
03300 static void transform_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
03301 {
03302     bTransformConstraint *data= con->data;
03303     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
03304     
03305     /* only evaluate if there is a target */
03306     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
03307         float loc[3], eul[3], size[3];
03308         float dvec[3], sval[3];
03309         int i;
03310         
03311         /* obtain target effect */
03312         switch (data->from) {
03313             case 2: /* scale */
03314                 mat4_to_size( dvec,ct->matrix);
03315                 break;
03316             case 1: /* rotation (convert to degrees first) */
03317                 mat4_to_eulO(dvec, cob->rotOrder, ct->matrix);
03318                 mul_v3_fl(dvec, RAD2DEGF(1.0f)); /* rad -> deg */
03319                 break;
03320             default: /* location */
03321                 copy_v3_v3(dvec, ct->matrix[3]);
03322                 break;
03323         }
03324         
03325         /* extract components of owner's matrix */
03326         copy_v3_v3(loc, cob->matrix[3]);
03327         mat4_to_eulO(eul, cob->rotOrder, cob->matrix);
03328         mat4_to_size(size, cob->matrix);    
03329         
03330         /* determine where in range current transforms lie */
03331         if (data->expo) {
03332             for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
03333                 if (data->from_max[i] - data->from_min[i])
03334                     sval[i]= (dvec[i] - data->from_min[i]) / (data->from_max[i] - data->from_min[i]);
03335                 else
03336                     sval[i]= 0.0f;
03337             }
03338         }
03339         else {
03340             /* clamp transforms out of range */
03341             for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
03342                 CLAMP(dvec[i], data->from_min[i], data->from_max[i]);
03343                 if (data->from_max[i] - data->from_min[i])
03344                     sval[i]= (dvec[i] - data->from_min[i]) / (data->from_max[i] - data->from_min[i]);
03345                 else
03346                     sval[i]= 0.0f;
03347             }
03348         }
03349         
03350         
03351         /* apply transforms */
03352         switch (data->to) {
03353             case 2: /* scaling */
03354                 for (i=0; i<3; i++)
03355                     size[i]= data->to_min[i] + (sval[(int)data->map[i]] * (data->to_max[i] - data->to_min[i])); 
03356                 break;
03357             case 1: /* rotation */
03358                 for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
03359                     float tmin, tmax;
03360                     
03361                     tmin= data->to_min[i];
03362                     tmax= data->to_max[i];
03363                     
03364                     /* all values here should be in degrees */
03365                     eul[i]= tmin + (sval[(int)data->map[i]] * (tmax - tmin)); 
03366                     
03367                     /* now convert final value back to radians */
03368                     eul[i] = DEG2RADF(eul[i]);
03369                 }
03370                 break;
03371             default: /* location */
03372                 /* get new location */
03373                 for (i=0; i<3; i++)
03374                     loc[i]= (data->to_min[i] + (sval[(int)data->map[i]] * (data->to_max[i] - data->to_min[i])));
03375                 
03376                 /* add original location back on (so that it can still be moved) */
03377                 add_v3_v3v3(loc, cob->matrix[3], loc);
03378                 break;
03379         }
03380         
03381         /* apply to matrix */
03382         loc_eulO_size_to_mat4(cob->matrix, loc, eul, size, cob->rotOrder);
03383     }
03384 }
03385 
03386 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_TRANSFORM = {
03387     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_TRANSFORM, /* type */
03388     sizeof(bTransformConstraint), /* size */
03389     "Transform", /* name */

03391     NULL, /* free data */
03392     NULL, /* relink data */
03393     transform_id_looper, /* id looper */
03394     NULL, /* copy data */

03396     transform_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03397     transform_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */

03400 };

03436 
03437 
03438 static void shrinkwrap_get_tarmat (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, bConstraintTarget *ct, float UNUSED(ctime))
03439 {
03440     bShrinkwrapConstraint *scon = (bShrinkwrapConstraint *) con->data;
03441     
03442     if ( VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct) && (ct->tar->type == OB_MESH) )
03443     {
03444         int fail = FALSE;
03445         float co[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
03446         float no[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
03447         float dist;
03448         
03449         SpaceTransform transform;
03450         DerivedMesh *target = object_get_derived_final(ct->tar);
03451         BVHTreeRayHit hit;
03452         BVHTreeNearest nearest;
03453         
03454         BVHTreeFromMesh treeData= {NULL};
03455         
03456         nearest.index = -1;
03457         nearest.dist = FLT_MAX;
03458         
03459         hit.index = -1;
03460         hit.dist = 100000.0f;  //TODO should use FLT_MAX.. but normal projection doenst yet supports it
03461         
03462         unit_m4(ct->matrix);
03463         
03464         if (target != NULL)
03465         {
03466             space_transform_from_matrixs(&transform, cob->matrix, ct->tar->obmat);
03467             
03468             switch(scon->shrinkType)
03469             {
03470                 case MOD_SHRINKWRAP_NEAREST_SURFACE:
03471                 case MOD_SHRINKWRAP_NEAREST_VERTEX:
03472                     
03473                     if (scon->shrinkType == MOD_SHRINKWRAP_NEAREST_VERTEX)
03474                         bvhtree_from_mesh_verts(&treeData, target, 0.0, 2, 6);
03475                     else
03476                         bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(&treeData, target, 0.0, 2, 6);
03477                     
03478                     if (treeData.tree == NULL)
03479                     {
03480                         fail = TRUE;
03481                         break;
03482                     }
03483                     
03484                     space_transform_apply(&transform, co);
03485                     
03486                     BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(treeData.tree, co, &nearest, treeData.nearest_callback, &treeData);
03487                     
03488                     dist = len_v3v3(co, nearest.co);
03489                     if (dist != 0.0f) {
03490                         interp_v3_v3v3(co, co, nearest.co, (dist - scon->dist)/dist);   /* linear interpolation */
03491                     }
03492                     space_transform_invert(&transform, co);
03493                 break;
03494                 
03495                 case MOD_SHRINKWRAP_PROJECT:
03496                     if (scon->projAxis & MOD_SHRINKWRAP_PROJECT_OVER_X_AXIS) no[0] = 1.0f;
03497                     if (scon->projAxis & MOD_SHRINKWRAP_PROJECT_OVER_Y_AXIS) no[1] = 1.0f;
03498                     if (scon->projAxis & MOD_SHRINKWRAP_PROJECT_OVER_Z_AXIS) no[2] = 1.0f;
03499                     
03500                     if (dot_v3v3(no, no) < FLT_EPSILON) {
03501                         fail = TRUE;
03502                         break;
03503                     }
03504                     
03505                     normalize_v3(no);
03506                     
03507                     
03508                     bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(&treeData, target, scon->dist, 4, 6);
03509                     if (treeData.tree == NULL)
03510                     {
03511                         fail = TRUE;
03512                         break;
03513                     }
03514                     
03515                     if (normal_projection_project_vertex(0, co, no, &transform, treeData.tree, &hit, treeData.raycast_callback, &treeData) == FALSE)
03516                     {
03517                         fail = TRUE;
03518                         break;
03519                     }
03520                     copy_v3_v3(co, hit.co);
03521                 break;
03522             }
03523             
03524             free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData);
03525             
03526             target->release(target);
03527             
03528             if (fail == TRUE) {
03529                 /* Don't move the point */
03530                 zero_v3(co);
03531             }
03532             
03533             /* co is in local object coordinates, change it to global and update target position */
03534             mul_m4_v3(cob->matrix, co);
03535             copy_v3_v3(ct->matrix[3], co);
03536         }
03537     }
03538 }
03539 
03540 static void shrinkwrap_evaluate (bConstraint *UNUSED(con), bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
03541 {
03542     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
03543     
03544     /* only evaluate if there is a target */
03545     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct))
03546     {
03547         copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], ct->matrix[3]);
03548     }
03549 }
03550 
03551 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_SHRINKWRAP = {
03552     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_SHRINKWRAP, /* type */
03553     sizeof(bShrinkwrapConstraint), /* size */
03554     "Shrinkwrap", /* name */
03555     "bShrinkwrapConstraint", /* struct name */
03556     NULL, /* free data */
03557     NULL, /* relink data */
03558     shrinkwrap_id_looper, /* id looper */
03559     NULL, /* copy data */
03560     NULL, /* new data */
03561     shrinkwrap_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03562     shrinkwrap_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
03563     shrinkwrap_get_tarmat, /* get a target matrix */
03564     shrinkwrap_evaluate /* evaluate */
03565 };

03583 
03584 static int damptrack_get_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list)
03585 {
03586     if (con && list) {
03587         bDampTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
03588         bConstraintTarget *ct;
03589         
03590         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
03591         SINGLETARGET_GET_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list)
03592         
03593         return 1;
03594     }
03595     
03596     return 0;
03597 }
03598 
03599 static void damptrack_flush_tars (bConstraint *con, ListBase *list, short nocopy)
03600 {
03601     if (con && list) {
03602         bDampTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
03603         bConstraintTarget *ct= list->first;
03604         
03605         /* the following macro is used for all standard single-target constraints */
03606         SINGLETARGET_FLUSH_TARS(con, data->tar, data->subtarget, ct, list, nocopy)
03607     }
03608 }
03609 
03610 /* array of direction vectors for the tracking flags */
03611 static const float track_dir_vecs[6][3] = {
03612     {+1,0,0}, {0,+1,0}, {0,0,+1},       /* TRACK_X,  TRACK_Y,  TRACK_Z */
03613     {-1,0,0}, {0,-1,0}, {0,0,-1}        /* TRACK_NX, TRACK_NY, TRACK_NZ */
03614 };
03615 
03616 static void damptrack_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
03617 {
03618     bDampTrackConstraint *data= con->data;
03619     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
03620     
03621     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
03622         float obvec[3], tarvec[3], obloc[3];
03623         float raxis[3], rangle;
03624         float rmat[3][3], tmat[4][4];
03625         
03626         /* find the (unit) direction that the axis we're interested in currently points 
03627          *  - mul_mat3_m4_v3() only takes the 3x3 (rotation+scaling) components of the 4x4 matrix 
03628          *  - the normalization step at the end should take care of any unwanted scaling
03629          *    left over in the 3x3 matrix we used
03630          */
03631         copy_v3_v3(obvec, track_dir_vecs[data->trackflag]);
03632         mul_mat3_m4_v3(cob->matrix, obvec);
03633         
03634         if (normalize_v3(obvec) == 0.0f) {
03635             /* exceptional case - just use the track vector as appropriate */
03636             copy_v3_v3(obvec, track_dir_vecs[data->trackflag]);
03637         }
03638         
03639         /* find the (unit) direction vector going from the owner to the target */
03640         copy_v3_v3(obloc, cob->matrix[3]);
03641         sub_v3_v3v3(tarvec, ct->matrix[3], obloc);
03642         
03643         if (normalize_v3(tarvec) == 0.0f) {
03644             /* the target is sitting on the owner, so just make them use the same direction vectors */
03645             // FIXME: or would it be better to use the pure direction vector?
03646             copy_v3_v3(tarvec, obvec);
03647             //copy_v3_v3(tarvec, track_dir_vecs[data->trackflag]);
03648         }
03649         
03650         /* determine the axis-angle rotation, which represents the smallest possible rotation
03651          * between the two rotation vectors (i.e. the 'damping' referred to in the name)
03652          *  - we take this to be the rotation around the normal axis/vector to the plane defined
03653          *    by the current and destination vectors, which will 'map' the current axis to the 
03654          *    destination vector
03655          *  - the min/max wrappers around (obvec . tarvec) result (stored temporarily in rangle)
03656          *    are used to ensure that the smallest angle is chosen
03657          */
03658         cross_v3_v3v3(raxis, obvec, tarvec);
03659         
03660         rangle= dot_v3v3(obvec, tarvec);
03661         rangle= acos( MAX2(-1.0f, MIN2(1.0f, rangle)) );
03662         
03663         /* construct rotation matrix from the axis-angle rotation found above 
03664          *  - this call takes care to make sure that the axis provided is a unit vector first
03665          */
03666         axis_angle_to_mat3(rmat, raxis, rangle);
03667         
03668         /* rotate the owner in the way defined by this rotation matrix, then reapply the location since
03669          * we may have destroyed that in the process of multiplying the matrix
03670          */
03671         unit_m4(tmat);
03672         mul_m4_m3m4(tmat, rmat, cob->matrix); // m1, m3, m2
03673         
03674         copy_m4_m4(cob->matrix, tmat);
03675         copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], obloc);
03676     }
03677 }
03678 
03679 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_DAMPTRACK = {
03680     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_DAMPTRACK, /* type */
03681     sizeof(bDampTrackConstraint), /* size */
03682     "Damped Track", /* name */
03683     "bDampTrackConstraint", /* struct name */
03684     NULL, /* free data */
03685     NULL, /* relink data */
03686     damptrack_id_looper, /* id looper */
03687     NULL, /* copy data */
03688     damptrack_new_data, /* new data */
03689     damptrack_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03690     damptrack_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
03691     default_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
03692     damptrack_evaluate /* evaluate */
03693 };

03755 
03756 static void splineik_get_tarmat (bConstraint *UNUSED(con), bConstraintOb *cob, bConstraintTarget *ct, float UNUSED(ctime))
03757 {
03758     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
03759         Curve *cu= ct->tar->data;
03760         
03761         /* note: when creating constraints that follow path, the curve gets the CU_PATH set now,
03762          *      currently for paths to work it needs to go through the bevlist/displist system (ton) 
03763          */
03764         
03765         /* only happens on reload file, but violates depsgraph still... fix! */
03766         if (cu->path==NULL || cu->path->data==NULL)
03767             makeDispListCurveTypes(cob->scene, ct->tar, 0);
03768     }
03769     
03770     /* technically, this isn't really needed for evaluation, but we don't know what else
03771      * might end up calling this...
03772      */
03773     if (ct)
03774         unit_m4(ct->matrix);
03775 }

03828 
03829 static void pivotcon_evaluate (bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *targets)
03830 {
03831     bPivotConstraint *data= con->data;
03832     bConstraintTarget *ct= targets->first;
03833     
03834     float pivot[3], vec[3];
03835     float rotMat[3][3];
03836 
03837     /* pivot correction */
03838     float axis[3], angle;
03839     
03840     /* firstly, check if pivoting should take place based on the current rotation */
03841     if (data->rotAxis != PIVOTCON_AXIS_NONE) {
03842         float rot[3];
03843         
03844         /* extract euler-rotation of target */
03845         mat4_to_eulO(rot, cob->rotOrder, cob->matrix);
03846         
03847         /* check which range might be violated */
03848         if (data->rotAxis < PIVOTCON_AXIS_X) {
03849             /* negative rotations (data->rotAxis = 0 -> 2) */
03850             if (rot[data->rotAxis] > 0.0f)
03851                 return;
03852         }
03853         else {
03854             /* positive rotations (data->rotAxis = 3 -> 5 */
03855             if (rot[data->rotAxis - PIVOTCON_AXIS_X] < 0.0f)
03856                 return;
03857         }
03858     }
03859     
03860     /* find the pivot-point to use  */
03861     if (VALID_CONS_TARGET(ct)) {
03862         /* apply offset to target location */
03863         add_v3_v3v3(pivot, ct->matrix[3], data->offset);
03864     }
03865     else {
03866         /* no targets to worry about... */
03867         if ((data->flag & PIVOTCON_FLAG_OFFSET_ABS) == 0) {
03868             /* offset is relative to owner */
03869             add_v3_v3v3(pivot, cob->matrix[3], data->offset);
03870         }
03871         else {
03872             /* directly use the 'offset' specified as an absolute position instead */
03873             copy_v3_v3(pivot, data->offset);
03874         }
03875     }
03876     
03877     /* get rotation matrix representing the rotation of the owner */
03878     // TODO: perhaps we might want to include scaling based on the pivot too?
03879     copy_m3_m4(rotMat, cob->matrix);
03880     normalize_m3(rotMat);
03881 
03882 
03883     /* correct the pivot by the rotation axis otherwise the pivot translates when it shouldnt */
03884     mat3_to_axis_angle(axis, &angle, rotMat);
03885     if (angle) {
03886         float dvec[3];
03887         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, pivot, cob->matrix[3]);
03888         project_v3_v3v3(dvec, vec, axis);
03889         sub_v3_v3(pivot, dvec);
03890     }
03891 
03892     /* perform the pivoting... */
03893         /* 1. take the vector from owner to the pivot */
03894     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cob->matrix[3], pivot);
03895         /* 2. rotate this vector by the rotation of the object... */
03896     mul_m3_v3(rotMat, vec);
03897         /* 3. make the rotation in terms of the pivot now */
03898     add_v3_v3v3(cob->matrix[3], pivot, vec);
03899 }
03900 
03901 
03902 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_PIVOT = {
03903     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_PIVOT, /* type */
03904     sizeof(bPivotConstraint), /* size */
03905     "Pivot", /* name */
03906     "bPivotConstraint", /* struct name */
03907     NULL, /* free data */
03908     NULL, /* relink data */
03909     pivotcon_id_looper, /* id looper */
03910     NULL, /* copy data */
03911     NULL, /* new data */ // XXX: might be needed to get 'normal' pivot behavior...
03912     pivotcon_get_tars, /* get constraint targets */
03913     pivotcon_flush_tars, /* flush constraint targets */
03914     default_get_tarmat, /* get target matrix */
03915     pivotcon_evaluate /* evaluate */
03916 };

03918 /* ----------- Follow Track ------------- */
03919 
03920 static void followtrack_new_data(void *cdata)
03921 {
03922     bFollowTrackConstraint *data = (bFollowTrackConstraint *)cdata;
03923 
03924     data->clip = NULL;
03925     data->flag |= FOLLOWTRACK_ACTIVECLIP;
03926 }
03927 
03928 static void followtrack_id_looper(bConstraint *con, ConstraintIDFunc func, void *userdata)
03929 {
03930     bFollowTrackConstraint *data = con->data;
03931 
03932     func(con, (ID**)&data->clip, userdata);
03933     func(con, (ID**)&data->camera, userdata);
03934     func(con, (ID**)&data->depth_ob, userdata);
03935 }
03936 
03937 static void followtrack_evaluate(bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *UNUSED(targets))
03938 {
03939     Scene *scene = cob->scene;
03940     bFollowTrackConstraint *data = con->data;
03941     MovieClip *clip = data->clip;
03942     MovieTracking *tracking;
03943     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
03944     MovieTrackingObject *tracking_object;
03945     Object *camob= data->camera ? data->camera : scene->camera;
03946 
03947     if (data->flag & FOLLOWTRACK_ACTIVECLIP)
03948         clip= scene->clip;
03949 
03950     if (!clip || !data->track[0] || !camob)
03951         return;
03952 
03953     tracking = &clip->tracking;
03954 
03955     if (data->object[0])
03956         tracking_object = BKE_tracking_named_object(tracking, data->object);
03957     else
03958         tracking_object = BKE_tracking_get_camera_object(tracking);
03959 
03960     if (!tracking_object)
03961         return;
03962 
03963     track = BKE_tracking_named_track(tracking, tracking_object, data->track);
03964 
03965     if (!track)
03966         return;
03967 
03968     if (data->flag & FOLLOWTRACK_USE_3D_POSITION) {
03969         if (track->flag & TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE) {
03970             float obmat[4][4], mat[4][4];
03971 
03972             copy_m4_m4(obmat, cob->matrix);
03973 
03974             if ((tracking_object->flag & TRACKING_OBJECT_CAMERA)==0) {
03975                 float imat[4][4];
03976 
03977                 copy_m4_m4(mat, camob->obmat);
03978 
03979                 BKE_tracking_get_interpolated_camera(tracking, tracking_object, scene->r.cfra, imat);
03980                 invert_m4(imat);
03981 
03982                 mul_serie_m4(cob->matrix, obmat, mat, imat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
03983                 translate_m4(cob->matrix, track->bundle_pos[0], track->bundle_pos[1], track->bundle_pos[2]);
03984             }
03985             else {
03986                 BKE_get_tracking_mat(cob->scene, camob, mat);
03987 
03988                 mult_m4_m4m4(cob->matrix, obmat, mat);
03989                 translate_m4(cob->matrix, track->bundle_pos[0], track->bundle_pos[1], track->bundle_pos[2]);
03990             }
03991         }
03992     }
03993     else {
03994         MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
03995         float vec[3], disp[3], axis[3], mat[4][4];
03996         float aspect= (scene->r.xsch * scene->r.xasp) / (scene->r.ysch * scene->r.yasp);
03997         float len, d;
03998 
03999         where_is_object_mat(scene, camob, mat);
04000 
04001         /* camera axis */
04002         vec[0] = 0.0f;
04003         vec[1] = 0.0f;
04004         vec[2] = 1.0f;
04005         mul_v3_m4v3(axis, mat, vec);
04006 
04007         /* distance to projection plane */
04008         copy_v3_v3(vec, cob->matrix[3]);
04009         sub_v3_v3(vec, mat[3]);
04010         project_v3_v3v3(disp, vec, axis);
04011 
04012         len = len_v3(disp);
04013 
04014         if (len > FLT_EPSILON) {
04015             CameraParams params;
04016             float pos[2], rmat[4][4];
04017 
04018             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, scene->r.cfra);
04019 
04020             add_v2_v2v2(pos, marker->pos, track->offset);
04021 
04022             camera_params_init(&params);
04023             camera_params_from_object(&params, camob);
04024 
04025             if (params.is_ortho) {
04026                 vec[0] = params.ortho_scale * (pos[0] - 0.5f + params.shiftx);
04027                 vec[1] = params.ortho_scale * (pos[1] - 0.5f + params.shifty);
04028                 vec[2] = -len;
04029 
04030                 if (aspect > 1.0f)
04031                     vec[1] /= aspect;
04032                 else
04033                     vec[0] *= aspect;
04034 
04035                 mul_v3_m4v3(disp, camob->obmat, vec);
04036 
04037                 copy_m4_m4(rmat, camob->obmat);
04038                 zero_v3(rmat[3]);
04039                 mult_m4_m4m4(cob->matrix, cob->matrix, rmat);
04040 
04041                 copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], disp);
04042             }
04043             else {
04044                 d=  (len * params.sensor_x) / (2.0f * params.lens);
04045 
04046                 vec[0] = d * (2.0f * (pos[0] + params.shiftx) - 1.0f);
04047                 vec[1] = d * (2.0f * (pos[1] + params.shifty) - 1.0f);
04048                 vec[2] = -len;
04049 
04050                 if (aspect > 1.0f)
04051                     vec[1] /= aspect;
04052                 else
04053                     vec[0] *= aspect;
04054 
04055                 mul_v3_m4v3(disp, camob->obmat, vec);
04056 
04057                 /* apply camera rotation so Z-axis would be co-linear */
04058                 copy_m4_m4(rmat, camob->obmat);
04059                 zero_v3(rmat[3]);
04060                 mult_m4_m4m4(cob->matrix, cob->matrix, rmat);
04061 
04062                 copy_v3_v3(cob->matrix[3], disp);
04063             }
04064 
04065             if (data->depth_ob && data->depth_ob->derivedFinal) {
04066                 Object *depth_ob = data->depth_ob;
04067                 BVHTreeFromMesh treeData = NULL_BVHTreeFromMesh;
04068                 BVHTreeRayHit hit;
04069                 float ray_start[3], ray_end[3], ray_nor[3], imat[4][4];
04070                 int result;
04071 
04072                 invert_m4_m4(imat, depth_ob->obmat);
04073 
04074                 mul_v3_m4v3(ray_start, imat, camob->obmat[3]);
04075                 mul_v3_m4v3(ray_end, imat, cob->matrix[3]);
04076 
04077                 sub_v3_v3v3(ray_nor, ray_end, ray_start);
04078 
04079                 bvhtree_from_mesh_faces(&treeData, depth_ob->derivedFinal, 0.0f, 4, 6);
04080 
04081                 hit.dist = FLT_MAX;
04082                 hit.index = -1;
04083 
04084                 result = BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(treeData.tree, ray_start, ray_nor, 0.0f, &hit, treeData.raycast_callback, &treeData);
04085 
04086                 if (result != -1) {
04087                     mul_v3_m4v3(cob->matrix[3], depth_ob->obmat, hit.co);
04088                 }
04089 
04090                 free_bvhtree_from_mesh(&treeData);
04091             }
04092         }
04093     }
04094 }
04095 
04096 static bConstraintTypeInfo CTI_FOLLOWTRACK = {
04097     CONSTRAINT_TYPE_FOLLOWTRACK, /* type */
04098     sizeof(bFollowTrackConstraint), /* size */
04099     "Follow Track", /* name */
04100     "bFollowTrackConstraint", /* struct name */
04101     NULL, /* free data */
04102     NULL, /* relink data */
04103     followtrack_id_looper, /* id looper */
04104     NULL, /* copy data */

04106     NULL, /* get constraint targets */

04109     followtrack_evaluate /* evaluate */
04110 };

04129 static void camerasolver_evaluate(bConstraint *con, bConstraintOb *cob, ListBase *UNUSED(targets))
04130 {
04131     Scene *scene = cob->scene;
04132     bCameraSolverConstraint *data = con->data;
04133     MovieClip *clip = data->clip;
04134 
04135     if (data->flag & CAMERASOLVER_ACTIVECLIP)
04136         clip = scene->clip;
04137 
04138     if (clip) {
04139         float mat[4][4], obmat[4][4];
04140         MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
04141         MovieTrackingObject *object = BKE_tracking_get_camera_object(tracking);
04142 
04143         BKE_tracking_get_interpolated_camera(tracking, object, scene->r.cfra, mat);
04144 
04145         copy_m4_m4(obmat, cob->matrix);
04146 
04147         mult_m4_m4m4(cob->matrix, obmat, mat);
04148     }
04149 }
